speaker1.speaker: SPEAKER_00
speaker1.roleSummary: The speaker is confirming, rescheduling, and providing details for a medical appointment while offering reminders and assistance.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Hi I'm Jessica I'm calling on behalf of Future Health to reconfirm your appointment with our doctor Are you available for a short conversation right now

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Great To ensure I have the correct information for you could you please confirm your date of birth for me please

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Thank you I see you have an appointment scheduled with Doctor Eleanor Vance in General practitioner GP

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: I'm not able to update your date of birth directly but I can connect you with our team Who can help with that Would you like me to transfer you to a human agent right now

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: No problem Are you looking to reschedule your existing appointment with Doctor Eleanor Vance or would you like to book a completely new appointment

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Of course Your appointment is with Doctor Eleanor Vance General practitioner GP on June 25th at 1 p.m. at Future Health Harley Street Clinic 120 Harley Street London one seven JS Please arrive 15 minutes early and bring your insurance card and any necessary documents

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Would you like me to send you a reminder via SMS or email

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Sure we can do that Would you like to see available dates with Doctor Eleanor Vance or are you open to another General Practitioner GP at a different location

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Got it The soonest available dates with doctor Eleanor Vance General Practitioner GP hour June 27th June 20th 9th or July 3rd Would any of these days work for you

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Would you like to stick with a general practitioner GP or are you looking for a different specialty

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: If GP is fine I can check the soonest dates with other available GPS for you

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Yes you can For lung issues you might want to see a pulmonologist Would you like to check the soonest available appointments with pulmonology specialist

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: The soonest available dates with our pulmonologist doctor Chloe Adams are June 30th July 2nd or July 6th These work for you

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Any of these works

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Great for June 30th The available times with Doctor Chloe Adams are 9:15 a.m. 10 a.m. or 10:45 a.m. Which of these times would suit you best

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Let's do ten

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Perfect Yes At 10 a.m. At Future Health city medical hub 15 Bishopsgate London Two Three Ah

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Would you like me to send you a reminder for this appointment via SMS or email

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Yes

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: All set You'll get an SMS reminder for your appointment with Doctor Chloe Adams on June 30th

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: No problem I'll send you both an SMS and an email reminder for your appointment

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Do you have all the information you need or is there anything else I can help with today

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Glad to hear everything's good for today We look forward to seeing you at your appointment Have a great day

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: Hi I'm Jessica I'm calling on behalf of Future Health to reconfirm your appointment with our doctor Are you available for a short conversation right now
